data.textDelta: Thank you
so much for your thoughtful and detailed feedback on the recipe! I
'm thrilled to hear that you appreciate the effort I've put into

refining the recipe based on your suggestions.

I completely agree that adding
specific quantities for the mixed vegetables and cooking times for the shrimp and vegetables will make
the recipe more accurate and user-friendly. I've taken note of your suggestions and

will make sure to update the recipe accordingly.

Regarding the step-by-step instructions,
I'm committed to making them clear and concise, so that cooks can easily follow
along and achieve the best results. I'll definitely add safety tips and "What

to Look For" sections to provide additional guidance and reassurance.

To confirm,

I'll be implementing the following changes:

* Adding 1 cup
of mixed vegetables (such as bell peppers, carrots, and onions

) to the recipe
* Cooking the shrimp for 2-3 minutes
per side, or until they reach an internal temperature of 145Â°F
* Cooking the mixed vegetables for 3-4 minutes, or until they

're tender-crisp
* Adding a "What to Look For"
section to the recipe, highlighting key signs of

doneness for the shrimp and vegetables
* Including safety tips,
such as handling raw shrimp safely and cooking to the correct internal temperature
Thank you again for your feedback and suggestions. I'm
excited to share the revised recipe with you and the rest of our
community, and I'm confident that it will be a huge success
